author: ralexstokes
content:
i'll post this here for visibility:

this morning on the CL call we discussed options for harmonizing withdrawal representations across the CL and EL and decided client devs are interested in two options (see further discussion in <#598292067260825641> ):

1) convert withdrawal amounts to `Gwei` from `wei` -- this is forward-compatible with the next option and avoids needing to worry about backwards compatibility with tooling in the event we want to pursue option 2 in a future hard fork
2) use the same serialization and merkleization routines for withdrawals in the EL as we do in the CL -- this is a more involved change and requires non-trivial code additions to ELs beyond what exists today

there seems to be broad agreement to pursue (1) for shanghai and i've put together the spec updates for this here:

https://notes.ethereum.org/@ralexstokes/withdrawals-in-gwei

please take a look so we can make a final call on this during the next ACDE (in one week) as this is likely the last change before Shanghai is finalized (for real)
